title: Santa Monica Pier sign
content:
Can anyone help identify typefaces similar to the ones used in this sign?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224706im_/http:/typophile.com/files/100130071358Edit_6420.jpg)
author: meghan

comments.content:
Four sets of sign lettering, blending bits and pieces of letters that are found in perhaps 20 or 30 different fonts. Here are a few that include some of the more interesting features such as the round top A and M, the goblet shaped Y and the reverse Z shaped S.  
Kleptocracy [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/kleptocracy/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224706/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/kleptocracy/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/kleptocracy/")  
Click [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-identikal/click/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224706/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-identikal/click/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-identikal/click/")  
Mink [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/mink/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224706/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/mink/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/mink/")  
Duepuntozero [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/zetafonts/duepuntozero/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224706/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/zetafonts/duepuntozero/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/zetafonts/duepuntozero/")  
Fab [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/fab/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224706/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/fab/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/fab/")  
Alt Lautus [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/andreas-leonidou/alt-lautus/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224706/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/andreas-leonidou/alt-lautus/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/andreas-leonidou/alt-lautus/")  
Era 404 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/don-citarella/era404/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224706/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/don-citarella/era404/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/don-citarella/era404/")  
Ambule [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/ambule/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224706/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/ambule/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/ambule/")  
Core Mellow [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/s-core/core-mellow/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224706/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/s-core/core-mellow/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/s-core/core-mellow/")  
Bellissimo [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/erik-bertell/eb-bellissimo-display/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224706/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/erik-bertell/eb-bellissimo-display/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/erik-bertell/eb-bellissimo-display/")  
Reflex [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/reflex/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224706/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/reflex/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/reflex/")  
Don
